Writer: Ivan Goff (television series), Ben Roberts (television series), John August (story), John August (screenplay), Cormac Wibberley (screenplay), Marianne Wibberley (screenplay)
Title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
Actors: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bernie Mac
Plot: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.
